ふれ合い: (ふれあい) - contact; connectedness; rapport; mutual touching
ふわふわ: (ふわふわ) - lightly (floating, drifting, etc.)/buoyantly; soft/fluffy/spongy; unsteadily/flightily/fickly/frivolously
ふんい気: (ふんいき) - atmosphere (e.g. musical); mood; ambience; ambiance
ふんぞり返る: (ふんぞりかえる) - to lie on one's back with legs outstretched/to recline; to get cocky/to be arrogant
ふんだくる: (ふんだくる) - to snatch/to grab/to steal; to charge (an exorbitant price) for
ふんどし一つ: (ふんどしひとつ) - (Esp. 〜で、〜の、〜になり) (wearing) a loincloth alone; nothing but a loincloth
ふんどし担ぎ: (ふんどしかつぎ) - rikishi of the lowest rank; underling
ふん反り返る: (ふんぞりかえる) - to lie on one's back with legs outstretched/to recline; to get cocky/to be arrogant
ふん囲気: (ふんいき) - atmosphere (e.g. musical); mood; ambience; ambiance
ふーっと: (フーッと) - with a whiff/with a puff; (ふっと only) suddenly/abruptly/without warning
ふーふー: (フゥフゥ) - sound of heavy breathing; blowing on something (e.g. to cool it down)
ぶうぶう: (ぶうぶう) - bugling sound/honking/oinking; grumbling/complaining; car/automobile
ぶくぶく: (ぶくぶく) - bulging/swelling (e.g. with water)/loose-fitting or baggy (clothing); bubbling/foaming
ぶくり: (ぶくり) - sound of something floating or sinking in water
ぶすっと: (ぶすっと) - sound of something thick and soft being pierced by something sharp and hard; containing sullen anger or discontent
ぶすぶす: (ぶすぶす) - sputtering/smoldering; repeated thrusting into something (sword, needle, etc.)/pricking repeatedly; (ブスブス, ぶすぶす only)  mutterings of discontent/faint sounds of complaint
ぶち切れる: (ぶちぎれる) - to be enraged; to flip out
ぶち壊す: (buchikowasu) - destruir, esmagar, quebrar com um golpe, arruinar; estragar, arruinar
ぶち当たる: (ぶちあたる) - to slam into (e.g. a wall, a limit) (figuratively)/to hit; to face (e.g. trouble, a problem)/to confront
ぶち抜き: (ぶちぬき) - removing a partition; straight through without interruption
ぶち撒ける: (ぶちまける) - to throw out (everything); to tell frankly/to confess
ぶち明ける: (ぶちあける) - to forcefully open up a hole (in a wall, etc.); to speak frankly, holding nothing back; to throw out everything inside
ぶち破る: (ぶちやぶる) - to smash down; to beat in
ぶち込む: (buchikomu) - to throw, to toss, to cast; to hit, to strike, to smash, to hammer in, to drive in; to fire into (por exemplo, uma multidão), to launch (e.g. missiles), to lob (e.g. grenades); to wear (sword, etc.), to carry
ぶち開ける: (ぶちあける) - to forcefully open up a hole (in a wall, etc.); to speak frankly, holding nothing back; to throw out everything inside
ぶっかけ飯: (ぶっかけめし) - rice with other ingredients poured on top
ぶっきら棒: (ぶっきらぼう) - curt; blunt; brusque
ぶった切る: (ぶったぎる) - to chop (a branch, etc.)
ぶっちゃけ: (ぶっちゃけ) - speaking one's mind and holding nothing back
ぶっちゃける: (ぶっちゃける) - to be frank ...; to put things bluntly ...
ぶっつけ: (ぶっつけ) - without preparation; off the cuff; abrupt; outspoken; (at) first
ぶっつけ本番: (ぶっつけほんばん) - performing without rehearsal
ぶっつり: (ふつり) - breaking off/snapping off; (ふっつり, ぷっつり, ふつり only)  suddenly stopping
ぶっ倒れる: (ぶったおれる) - to fall flat; to collapse in a heap
ぶっ切る: (ぶっきる) - to violently cut something apart; to hack down; to chop; to cut off
ぶっ切れる: (ぶっきれる) - to suddenly break with a snap/to suddenly get cut off; to snap/to become furious
ぶっ叩く: (ぶったたく) - to beat vigorously; to rain stikes upon someone; to tan someone's hide; to mericlessly pummel; to beat the daylights out of
ぶっ壊す: (ぶっこわす) - to destroy/to crush/to break by striking/to wreck; to spoil/to ruin
ぶっ掛ける: (ぶっかける) - to dash (e.g. liquid on someone's face); to slosh; to splash; to souse; to pour
ぶっ放す: (ぶっぱなす) - to fire a gun; to let off a gun; to loose off a shell
ぶっ殺す: (ぶっころす) - to beat to death; to kill
ぶっ潰す: (ぶっつぶす) - to smash violently; to crush
ぶっ通し: (ぶっとおし) - continuous; nonstop; consecutive; ceaseless
ぶっ違い: (ぶっちがい) - diagonal cross; x-shaped cross
ぶっ飛ばす: (ぶっとばす) - to strike (as to send flying)/to beat/to knock; to jump with force/to leap; to accomplish a task very rapidly; to drive at full speed (e.g. a car)
ぶっ飛ぶ: (ぶっとぶ) - to jump/to leap with great strength; to lack common sense; to be extremely surprised (by)
ぶつかり合う: (ぶつかりあう) - to collide; to clash
ぶつかり稽古: (ぶつかりげいこ) - {sumo} head-to-head training; drill consisting of pushing and being pushed; battering practice
ぶつけ合う: (ぶつけあう) - to knock (ideas) against each other/to present competing ideas/to have a lively exchange of ideas; to smash together/to crash into each other/to throw at each other
ぶつぶつ: (butsubutsu) - resmungo, reclamação, queixa, resmurrar; espinhas, manchas, erupção, erupção cutânea; cortar em pedaços pequenos; cozinhar em fogo brando
ぶつ切り: (butsugiri) - pedaço, torrão, fatia grossa, cortando em pedaços
ぶつ切りにする: (ぶつぎりにする) - to cut into chunks; to chop into lumps
ぶどう豆: (ぶどうまめ) - black soybean; soybeans boiled in sugary water; pea
ぶらつく: (ブラつく) - to dangle; to swing; to stroll about; to hang around; to linger
ぶらぶら: (ブラブラ) - dangling heavily/swaying to and fro/swinging; strolling/rambling/roaming/wandering; idly/lazily/leisurely/aimlessly; persisting (of an illness)
ぶらりぶらり: (ぶらりぶらり) - dangling heavily; swaying to and fro; swinging
ぶら下がり: (ぶらさがり) - cornering someone by lying in wait, e.g. for an unexpected interview or photograph/doorstepping; hanging/dangling
ぶら下がりインデント: (ぶらさがりインデント) - hanging indent
ぶら下がり取材: (ぶらさがりしゅざい) - doorstop interview; doorstep interview; on-the-move interview; informal interview in which reporters surround a public figure and prod him for an off-the-cuff response
ぶら下がる: (ぶらさがる) - to hang from; to dangle; to swing
ぶら下げる: (ぶらさげる) - to hang; to suspend; to dangle; to swing; to carry
ぶりっ子: (ブリッコ) - woman or girl who acts cute by playing innocent and helpless
ぶりぶり: (ぶりぶり) - angrily/in a huff/in anger; high on marijuana; (プリプリ, ぷりぷり only) tender (to chew)
ぶるう: (ぶるう) - to cower in fear; to be scared; to be nervous
